title: Coinbase CEO calls out Apple’s ‘potential antitrust issues’ over crypto in recent podcast
content:
In an episode of the Superteam Podcast this week, Coinbase CEO Brian Armstrong called out Apple for its App Store not being crypto-friendly. Armstrong continued to accuse the tech giant of disrupting the company’s product roadmap as well as banning certain app features.

more…
